references.paper_title: Structured denoising diffusion models in discrete state-spaces.
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of discrete diffusion models, which is the foundation of the proposed ResGen model.
MaskGIT introduces the concept of masked image modeling using transformers, which is a core component of ResGen.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis.
references.reason: This work demonstrates the effectiveness of using transformers for image generation, which is also leveraged in ResGen.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis, which is related to the approach taken in ResGen.

references.paper_title: Autoregressive image generation using residual quantization.
references.reason: This paper explores autoregressive image generation using Residual Vector Quantization (RVQ), which ResGen builds upon and aims to improve.
